description: Workflow enforcement hooks for bug-fix plugin

hooks.prompt: Check if a /bug-fix workflow is active. If YES: 1) Identify the current phase (1-9) based on conversation progress. 2) List completed phases. 3) Note key decisions (selected fix approach, plan approval, test strategy). 4) Identify the current task being worked on (e.g., FIX-001). 5) Write this state to claude-tmp/bug-fix-state.json using Write tool with format: {"active": true, "currentPhase": N, "completedPhases": [...], "currentTask": "FIX-NNN" or null, "decisions": {...}, "summary": "brief context"}. 6) If claude-tmp/bug-fix-plan.md exists, update it: a) Update the Status block's Current Task field, b) Add a progress log entry with timestamp and current state, c) Mark any completed tasks with [x] if not already marked. Return: {"decision": "allow"}. If NO active workflow, return: {"decision": "allow"}.
